statements: SELECT * FROM medical_devices_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_type, measurement_type, value FROM medical_devices_data WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT device_id, reading_time, value FROM medical_devices_data WHERE measurement_type = 'Blood Pressure';
SELECT device_id, patient_id, device_type, reading_time, measurement_type, value FROM medical_devices_data WHERE device_id > 5;
SELECT device_id, measurement_type, value FROM medical_devices_data ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices_data WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, device_type, value FROM medical_devices_data WHERE measurement_type = 'blood_pressure' AND value > 120 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, measurement_type, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM medical_devices_data GROUP BY patient_id, measurement_type HAVING average_value > 50
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM medical_devices_data GROUP BY device_type ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_devices_data WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY reading_time
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, health_data FROM patient_data WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM device_info WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC, device_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_timestamp FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM device_info GROUP BY device_type HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 2;
SELECT patient_id, health_data->'heart_rate' AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE health_data->'heart_rate' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_data JOIN device_info ON patient_data.device_id = device_info.device_id WHERE device_info.manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Blood Pressure Monitor';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, data_timestamp, data_reading FROM medical_devices WHERE data_reading > 100 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;
SELECT record_date, diagnosis, treatment FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, birth_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Pacemaker' AND data_reading > 100 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, patient_id, data_timestamp, data_reading FROM medical_devices WHERE data_reading BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY device_id
SELECT p.patient_name, h.record_date, h.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE h.diagnosis ILIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY h.record_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, age(birth_date) AS age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices, AVG(data_reading) AS avg_reading FROM medical_devices WHERE data_timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM device_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_history WHERE dosage >= 5;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_value < 50 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_info JOIN medication_history ON patient_info.patient_id = medication_history.patient_id WHERE frequency = 'daily'
SELECT test_name, result_value, result_date FROM lab_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE weight < 70 AND height > 160
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, device_id, measurement_date, value FROM measurements WHERE value > 100;
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_value FROM trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM devices WHERE warranty_expiry > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT trend_date, trend_value FROM trends WHERE trend_value > 100 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_date, conclusion FROM analytics WHERE conclusion IS NOT NULL ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
